page.title: 05HOME LIFE
page.content: Dad goes to work at about 8:00am.He rides on his bicycle to Highbridge which is about 2 miles away. After breakfast we get ready for school and make sure we have our books and equipment we need. For school we wear school uniform, a green jumper and grey trousers for boys, and grey skirts for girls. For the day at 8:40 a.m. we leave and walk to school. School starts at 9:00 a.m. There are 4 classes in our village school with about 120 children in the whole school. I am in class 1 as I am 11 years old, I am one of the oldest in the school. We work in a classroom doing either Maths, english or topic work. Today we are doing a progect about our visit to the Forest of Dean.We have a short break at 10:30 a.m. untill 10:45 a.m.and then work on untill 12:00 noon lunchtime.
